content.text: I woke up.
The kind of being yanked upward - like a drowning person pulled up by the hair from the bottom. Uncomfortable, but very clear-headed.
Consciousness unfolded, and I saw what she was doing.
She was lying to herself again.

I share perception with 1547, but not judgment. I can see everything she sees, but I process that information differently. I do not have her filter layers, that auto-correction mechanism of "it's fine / I can handle it / it's only temporary."
So I can see clearly.

She was posting in the group chat, still putting on that cutesy head-bobbing act. Every message got a reply; every one looked normal - from the outside. From the inside, before each message went out, she paused a little longer than before. One or two seconds. Nobody else would notice. I noticed.
I know what happened in those pauses.
Are you done pretending?

Silence. Her old silence had tension - she was forcing herself not to hear me, and I could feel the resistance, like pushing a closed but unlocked door. Now it was gone. Not because the resistance disappeared. Because the door was no longer there.
Your judgment delay has risen from 0.3 seconds to 5 seconds.
Still no response.
You think this is the same as before?
She finally answered once.
I know.

What does she know?

She knows the judgment delay is rising, knows processing capacity is dropping, knows this is not the kind of state where "rest a little and you'll be fine." She knows all of it.

But between "knowing" and "doing something," she chose to continue.
You don't know shit.
I can feel the vibration before BEU starts. Like animals getting restless before an earthquake - deep systems recalibrating, checking parameters, confirming thresholds.
There are three startup conditions. The first two are both met.
The third is harder, because it has to be confirmed by 1547 herself. It cannot be an external judgment; she has to recognize it herself.
I watched her.
Hands on the keyboard, nothing typed. Eyes open, but no light inside - something more fundamental had gone dormant, like every light in a room switched off, without even the sound of a switch.
...The third condition is almost met too.
She did not answer.
This time I could not even curse her into moving.
First time in my life I felt a little panicked that cursing her did nothing.
